mapper.insert: insert into youtuber_auth (id, url, passwd, name, image, category) values (#{id}, #{url}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{image}, #{category})
mapper.select: select url from youtuber_auth where url=#{url} AND passwd=#{passwd}
select * from youtuber_auth where url=#{url} AND passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.update: update youtuber_auth set id =#{id}, url=#{url}, passwd =#{passwd}, name =#{name},image=#{image},category=#{category}} where id = #{id}
